# ENStatus.restricted

**Case**

Notification is not active due to system restrictions, such as parental controls.

## Declaration

```swift
case restricted
```

## Discussion

When in this state, the app cannot enable exposure notification.

## States

- **ENStatus.active**: Notification is active.
- **ENStatus.bluetoothOff**: Bluetooth is turned off.
- **ENStatus.disabled**: Notification is disabled.
- **ENStatus.unknown**: Notification is unknown.
- **ENStatus.paused**: The user paused Exposure Notification.
- **ENStatus.unauthorized**: The user hasn’t authorized Exposure Notification.

items.description: The user hasn’t authorized Exposure Notification.
items.name: ENStatus.unauthorized

title: ENStatus.restricted
